mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY u.USER_ID_NO) AS NUM, u.USER_STATUS, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_EMAIL, COUNT(op.ORDER_ID) AS ORDER_COUNT, u.USER_CREATED_AT FROM user u LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.USER_ID_NO = u.USER_ID_NO LEFT JOIN order_product op on o.ORDER_ID = op.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN delivery d on u.USER_ID_NO = d.USER_ID_NO GROUP BY u.USER_ID_NO
SELECT DELIVERY_NAME, USER_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS FROM delivery WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user) AS totalUserCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE USER_STATUS = '활동중') AS activeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE USER_STATUS = '탈퇴') AS withdrawCount;
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET USER_STATUS = '탈퇴' WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}
